citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 - 1:40pm
on 03/10/2015.
Contact with licensee was made via phone call. Licensee informed inspector he was not available.
